TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
First is TOS and second is Voyager? Just guessing wildly here.

1-Voyager

2-Deep Space 9

3-The Next Generation

4-The Original Series

5-The Animated Series

6-Enterprise (although bonus points for having a pretty good intro that I can't help hearing every time I watch a rocket launch)

The listing for Favourite Movie takes far too long to work up, though.

So. has anyone ACTUALLY had close calls with insanity? by this I mean clinically insane.

Like getting sent to the farm level?

There's a story to be told about that...
If we're just talking psychiatric institutions, I was in one for a few months because of depression.

I had a close encounter with Insanity once...It wasn't pretty. It involves a false hope, and a obsessively drawn fictional character named Connie.

@the guy below meVVVV We're talking in need of psychiatric help insanity.

Edited June 3, 2013 by Rage097

I was trapped inside a dream and just managed to keep my sanity. Did I mention it was a nightmare? The nightmare seemed to last for hours, as it appeared that I was going around in circles running away from my subconcious fears.

I am TNG fan (2nd VOY, 3rd TOS), but I liked all Star Trek series... Enterprise wasn't so bad ,but it's potential has been wasted.

So. has anyone ACTUALLY had close calls with insanity? by this I mean clinically insane.

I hope not.

Maybe better restate the question and ask about your odd habits.

For example I like walking during contemplating about some problems, so best ideas came to me during a walk or going between places.

Edited June 3, 2013 by karolus10
I like TOS the most. It has a special charme to it.
Stahp derailing mah discussinz!
*hides from the trekkies*

I am TNG fan (2nd VOY, 3rd TOS), but I liked all Star Trek series... Enterprise wasn't so bad ,but it's potential has been wasted.

Maybe better restate the question and ask about your odd habits.

For example I like walking during contemplating about some problems, so best ideas came to me during a walk or going between places.

I totally agree on the wasted potential of Enterprise. We got weird new aliens and out-of-timeline old ones (LOOKING AT THE BORG THERE; NO, I WON'T GET OVER IT) instead of, you know, actual history. :/

I'm a "walk to think" type person too. It's relaxing and enlightening at the same time! Most of my ideas for PfL have come from there.
*still hides*

A comment on the Star Trek franchise followed by a brief, humorous statement regarding the content of the post above this one.

dammit i'm feel horrible.

Edited June 4, 2013 by Rage097

*still hides*

We convert through love, not terror, fear not.

WHO WANTS TO SEE RECENT PICS OF CUTE KITTENS??? :D

we convert through love, not terror, fear not.

Who wants to see recent pics of cute kittens??? :d

meeeeeeeeeeeeee

This one is Rocket, or Rocky.

And this one is Molly. Sorry about the fuzzyness, she's a wild one.
...Well that makes me feel a lot better.
Adorable kittens? I aim to please

:3

I'm currently need a kitten IRL simply because i'm recovering from THIS LINK ITS SO STUPID.

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php

HEADDESK KITTEH
All I had to do was read it. Why do you do this to yourself??
If you look at that kitten it makes you feel it's a life like puppet with sticks in side that fail to support the head so it *facedesk*

The sleepy kitty just needs a nap, is all.

*scoops sleepy kitty; places on lap*

Meow.

I don't know why i do this. it's worse than reading average youtube comments. Uhg. *depressed due to idiocy of the universe*

Meow.

I don't know why i do this. it's worse than reading average youtube comments. Uhg. *depressed due to idiocy of the universe*

I don't scroll down when I'm watching youtube videos. Makes me sad and angry.

Kitty! *patpat*
